content: META: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Phase 1.1: Rename find_required_app_with_workspace to find_required_app_with_path and find_required_example_with_workspace to find_required_example_with_path in scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after renaming functions
Phase 1.2: Add relative_path field to CargoBinaryInfo and CargoExampleInfo structs in scanning.rs
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding relative_path fields
Phase 1.3: Implement proper path matching logic supporting full paths, partial paths, and workspace fallback in find_required_*_with_path functions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing path matching
Phase 1.4: Update PathDisambiguation error to show relative paths instead of workspace names
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating error messages
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 3.1.1: Extract should_skip_directory function from recursive_scan
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after extracting should_skip_directory
Phase 3.1.2: Extract process_cargo_toml function from recursive_scan
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after extracting process_cargo_toml
Phase 3.1.3: Extract discover_workspace_members function from recursive_scan
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after extracting discover_workspace_members
Phase 3.1.4: Refactor recursive_scan to use the newly extracted functions
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after refactoring recursive_scan
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 2.1: Create DiscoverableItem trait with name, workspace_root, and relative_path methods
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating trait
Phase 2.2: Implement DiscoverableItem trait for BinaryInfo and ExampleInfo
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after implementing trait
Phase 2.3: Create generic find_all_items_by_name function and refactor find_all_apps_by_name and find_all_examples_by_name to use it
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating generic function
Phase 2.4: Create generic find_required_item_with_path function and refactor app/example versions to use it
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating generic path function
Phase 2.5: Create safe_canonicalize helper function and replace all canonicalization patterns
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding canonicalize helper
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 3.2.1: Create ProjectRegistry struct to handle deduplication logic
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after creating ProjectRegistry
Phase 3.2.2: Refactor iter_cargo_project_paths to use ProjectRegistry for simpler deduplication
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after refactoring deduplication
Phase 4.1: Add cargo metadata caching to avoid repeated calls
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding caching
Phase 4.2: Fix canonicalization error handling to log warnings instead of silently continuing
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after fixing error handling
Phase 4.3: Add validation that workspace members exist on disk
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding validation
Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings
Fix any clippy issues found
Phase 5.1: Update path_disambiguation.md tests to include full path, partial path, and fallback test cases
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after updating tests
Phase 5.2: Add unit tests for new generic functions and path matching logic
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings after adding unit tests
Run cargo +nightly fmt
Run cargo nextest run
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do code review focusing on whether issues were addressed
Review suggested changes from code review with user
